meanings.definition: A series of three related works, such as books or films, that are connected by a common theme or storyline.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading trilogies because they tell a complete story in three parts.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a special offer on fantasy trilogies this week.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that her life felt like a trilogy - childhood, teenage years, and adulthood.
meanings.sent4: The trilogies of nature, with spring, summer, and fall, never fail to amaze me.
meanings.sent5: In the library, I discovered a hidden gem among the historical trilogies.

meanings.definition: The group of three works themselves.
meanings.sent1: The trilogies on my shelf are all by different authors.
meanings.sent2: She lent me her favorite trilogies to read over the weekend.
meanings.sent3: At the movie marathon, we watched trilogies back to back.
meanings.sent4: The trilogies in the museum showcase different art styles from various periods.
meanings.sent5: I always look forward to discussing the endings of trilogies with my book club.
